article_title: Regis College hosts lecture on Affordable Care Act’s impact on health care
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: WESTON — On the sixth anniversary of the signing of the Affordable Care Act law on March 23, Regis College convened a panel of leading healthcare experts to discuss the impact of the law in a forum titled "Transforming Healthcare: Healthcare Reform and Beyond." The four panelists, Barbara Anthony, James Roosevelt Jr., Renée Markus Hodin and Secretary Marylou Sudders, spoke to the perspectives of insurance companies, government agencies and consumers. The conversation included a
